# Tender Announcement: CFAD Water Distribution System - Phase I, 17 Wing Detachment Dundurn

**Tender Reference:** PW-22-01013901
**Solicitation Number:** DN200003_CN78726
**Publication Date:** 2022-11-17
**Tender Closing Date:** 2022-12-15T15:00:00
**Tender Status:** Expiré

**Tender Description:**
Defence Construction Canada (DCC) invites bids for the CFAD Water Distribution System - Phase I, 17 Wing Detachment Dundurn. The project scope includes, but is not limited to, the installation of a new potable water distribution system, including labor, materials, supervision, and equipment.

**Key Dates:**

* Site Visit: November 24, 2022, at 10:00am (local time) to Building 268 CFAD Headquarters
* Work Completion Date: 250 calendar days after contract award
* Substantial Completion Date: 30 calendar days after Work Completion Date

**Security Requirements:**
The selected contractor must hold a valid DOS-RELIABILITY, issued by the Contract Security Program (CSP) of Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC).

**Bid Requirements:**

* Tender Documents are available from MERX
* Bids from non-registered bidders may be declared invalid
* A non-mandatory site visit is recommended

**Security and Payment Information:**

* Details on payment requirements and timelines can be found on the DCC website
* DCC publicly discloses information on payments made to prime contractors

**Procurement Details:**

* Tender Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Procurement Category: Construction, Utilities (Electrical, Water, Gas, and Sanitary Services)
* Region: Saskatchewan
* Estimated Contract Value: $6,561,000.00

**Contact Information:**
Marty Yurchak, Contracting Authority
email: [Marty.Yurchak@dcc-cdc.gc.ca](mailto:Marty.Yurchak@dcc-cdc.gc.ca)
phone: 780-842-1363 ext. 1501

**Tender Evaluation Criteria:**
Details on selection criteria and evaluation process are outlined in the Tender Documents.

Late bids will not be accepted. Respondents are responsible for their own bid security. No bidder may contact anyone other than the contracting authority for clarification. 

Best regards,
[Your Name]
